thread.title: Add comedy to the lineup at he Sayers Club in Las Vegas
thread.title_full: Add comedy to the lineup at he Sayers Club in Las Vegas

author: Susan Stapleton
title: Add comedy to the lineup at he Sayers Club in Las Vegas
text:
Add comedy to the lineup at he Sayers Club in Las Vegas The Sayers Club 
The Sayers Club hosts Bonkerz Comedy Club every weekend in July. 
The Sayers Club hosts Bonkerz Comedy Club every weekend in July. (SLS Las Vegas) Las Vegas Travel 
Bonkerz Comedy Club joins the fray at The Sayers Club inside SLS Las Vegas , adding comedy to the live music venue every Thursday through Saturday in July. 
Among the comedians on the docket is Erik Myers, who tells the types of jokes that fans try to pass off as their own the next day at work. He performs July 9-11. 0 
Ian Gutoskie, who stands tall at 6-foot-7, talks about getting older, skydiving, his four dogs and the ritual of girls’ night out during his performances July 16-18. 
Michael “Wheels” Parise toured with Andrew Dice Clay for more than 23 years and is in talks to film a new reality show in Las Vegas and Los Angeles. He performs July 23-25. 
The month ends with J.C. Currais, July 30 through Aug. 1. The comedian has shared the stage with Ralphie May, David Allen Grier and Pauly Shore and is the star of the online sitcom “Oppie’s Friend Gene.” He made his film debut in the Sundance Film Festival film “New Low.” 
Tickets start at $10.
